results.abstract: Lawrence Van Gelder reviews Leo de Boer film The Red Stuff, in Russian, and Aki Kaurismaki film Total Balalaika Show, new double feature of documentaries at Film Forum; photo (M)

headline.main: Humanizing Those Other Pilots With the Right Stuff

results.snippet: As odd couples go, the new double feature of documentaries at the Film Forum is a reward and a delight created out of the sublime and the ridiculous.    One half is ''The Red Stuff,'' a Dutch film that revisits the early years of the Soviet space...
results.lead_paragraph: As odd couples go, the new double feature of documentaries at the Film Forum is a reward and a delight created out of the sublime and the ridiculous. One half is ''The Red Stuff,'' a Dutch film that revisits the early years of the Soviet space program.
